HEADLINE: ICICI Lombard General Insurance Limited has informed Exchange about the investor presentation and opening remarks for the result call held on October 17, 2017 to discuss the financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2017.

ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Limited will host an earnings call with analysts and investors at 18:30 hrs (IST) on Wednesday, April 25, 2018 to discuss the performance of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2018.

The transcript of the conference call will be posted on the Company''s website at www.icicilombard.com

ICICI Lombard General Insurance Limited has informed Exchange about the investor presentation and opening remarks for the result call held on January 16, 2018 to discuss the financial results for the quarter ended December 31, 2017.

Disclosure under Regulation 30 read with Schedule III and Regulation 46(2) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
